tests.name: Philosophy
tests.description: Find out how you stand along many philosophical dichotomies from egoism and altruism to skepticism and absolutism.

tests.name: Economics
tests.description: How do you think the economy should be run? Find out now and see your results displayed along multiple economic axes.

tests.name: Personality Compass
tests.description: Find out where you land on our personality compass. This test will measure four key personality traits along two dichotomic axes.

tests.name: Literature
tests.description: Do you prefer realistic literature or fantasy? Dark or light-hearted? This test breaks down your literary taste into seven different dichotomies!

tests.name: Memes
tests.description: Do you like memes? /r/FellowKids here we come...

tests.name: Political Philosophy
tests.description: Do you lean to the left or to the right politically? This test will attempt to discover your philosophical beliefs regarding politics along a number of axes.

tests.name: Victimhood
tests.description: Based on the Tendency for Interpersonal Victimhood, this test will attempt to determine your perceived level of victimhood across your interpersonal relationships.

tests.name: Sensation Seeking
tests.description: Based on Zuckerman's Sensation Seeking Scale, this test will attempt to determine how inclined you are to seek out varied, novel and intense experiences.

tests.name: Fear
tests.description: Based on Geer's Fear Survey Schedule, this test will attempt to determine how fearful you are; the test incorporates multiple fear factors to break down your results.

tests.name: Obsessions and Compulsions
tests.description: Based on the Padua Inventory, this test will attempt to determine how obsessive-compulsive you are.
